title: Bachelor of Science – Software Development
description: Pursuing a Bachelor’s in Software Development (online, asynchronous), focused on web development and software engineering. Completed a Web and Computer Programming Certificate (GPA 3.91) and an Associate Degree in Web Development. Collaborate on individual and group coding projects with international peers, applying problem-solving, teamwork, and communication skills.

title: University Preparation Program
description: Official preparation program for admission to Brigham Young University–Idaho, covering core U.S. subjects like Math, English, Workplace Orientation, and communication skills. Collaborated on presentations and independent projects with international peers, enhancing leadership, problem-solving, and communication abilities. Adapted to online learning while maintaining high academic standards, completing the program with a GPA of 3.61.
